projects.title: Mars Kitchen
projects.description: Published VR title on Meta Quest and PSVR. I designed some missions and implemented the quest system and dialogue system. I designed and programmed a Beat Saber-inspired hand-tracking mode (Meta Start Dev Competition), a multi-lightset baking solution for instant teleport between co-existing environments, and a system to virtualize alien customer behavior (simulation runs even off-screen). I also contributed to polishing (juice/feel) and handled the PlayStation port.

projects.title: Polyverse
projects.description: Web game. I owned the 3C end-to-end (character/camera/controls), blockchain integration, and the combat system. I implemented an A* pathfinding solution for enemies that is 100% deterministic, plus the full UI and tutorial.

projects.title: Acryptia
projects.description: Card game with an authoritative server. I designed and implemented the core game loop, the full UI, and seeded deck randomization. I built the skins system and a mechanic that gives utility to NFT skins, as well as the special traits for monsters. I also contributed to optimization and polishing (juice/feel).
